chapter.title: About
chapter.para: In the About area of Configure, you can see session information for the console, download the Red Hat CloudForms documentation in PDF format, and navigate to the Red Hat Customer Portal.

procedure.title: To View Session Information, Documentation, and the Red Hat Customer Portal Link

step.para: To go to the Red Hat Customer Portal, click http://access.redhat.com/home.
To view the documentation, click the title of the document to view.
